title: I... I don't... I just can't.... Whyyy?.... What??...
body:
On the pbe you now need 2 or more players to play a custom?

WHAT IS THE FUNCTIONAL PURPOSE OF THIS????

Lots of people use customs for testing things, for making videos, or if you only have like 20 min until you need to leave the house or something instead of playing a normal or coop vs Ai and afk halfway through, you can just muck around in a custom playing ap yas or something until you need to go. 

So why ruin it for those people?
Like that's not a rhetorical question.. Actually why?


Please riot don't put this into the live servers!

This will inevitably increase AFK's in matchmade games, and no one wants that.

replies.body: From memory, they activate it on pbe when there are a lot of people playing. PBE servers are a lot smaller, so they can't handle as many games, hence why there is the minimum for customs
Im really hoping this is the case!
